title: Inflation exceeds prediction, real i rate falls

content.question: Which of the following could have caused the decrease in the real interest rate?

choices.label: There was an increase in the nominal interest rate.
There was a decrease in the nominal interest rate.
There was a decrease in the money supply.
The actual inflation rate was greater than the expected inflation rate.
The actual inflation rate was less than the expected inflation rate.

content.answer: The actual inflation rate was greater than the expected inflation rate.

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Interpret a specific economic outcome using quantitative data or calculations.
